data.description: A module for building/parsing IODEF Docs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
It a module for building/parsing IODEF Documents, which are XML
    based. Therefore XML::IODEF seems the best namespace choice. A
    similar modules is XML::IDMEF, which provides similar functionality
    for IDMEF messages (and it what this modules is based on).
